headline: Boster Bio Supports Researchers with Free Antibody Validation, Elevating IHC Service Capabilities
summary: Pleasanton, Oct. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PLEASANTON, CA October 06, 2025 - - Boster Biological Technology (Boster Bio), a supplier of high-quality antibodies and immunoassays for over 30 years and a recipient of CiteAb recognition for antibody quality, announced a free antibody validation program alongside enhancements to its Immunohistochemistry (IHC) service lab, giving researchers end-to-end support from project design to staining and analysis.
